sentence.Network_en: Before the poor wretch had time to speak, he was shot.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个可怜的人还没来得及开口就中了枪。

sentence.Network_en: Oh, what have you done, you wretch!
sentence.Network_cn: 噢，你都干了些什么，你这个混蛋！

sentence.Network_en: You are really an ungrateful wretch to complain instead of thanking him.
sentence.Network_cn: 你不但不谢他,还埋怨他,真不知好歹.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English wrecca (also in the sense 'banished person'), of West Germanic origin; related to German Recke 'warrior, hero', also to the verb wreak

entry.def: You can refer to someone as a wretch when you feel sorry for them because they are unhappy or unfortunate.

example.ex: Before the poor wretch had time to speak, he was shot.
example.tran: 这个可怜的人还没来得及开口就中了枪。

entry.def: You can refer to someone as a wretch when you think that they are wicked or if they have done something you are angry about.

example.ex: Oh, what have you done, you wretch!
example.tran: 噢，你都干了些什么，你这个混蛋！

auth_sentence.content: What is man? Sinful and weak,...a wretch.
auth_sentence.res_content: What is man? Sinful and weak,...a wretch.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What is man? Sinful and weak,...a wretch.

auth_sentence.content: Excellent wretch! Perdition catch my soul But I do love thee.

auth_sentence.content: I see my wife wants me. The poor wretch is terribly jealous.
